participant_1.background:
I remember buying my first police uniform.
i listen to pink when i am painting.
I like to wear comfortable clothes that allow me to move around and express myself.
I like to listen to country music because it reminds me of my family and home.
i hate fast food.

participant_2.background:
I get to spend lots of time playing and laughing with my kids.
I enjoy trying new foods, but my favorite dishes are usually simple and comforting.
i watch every football game at alabama.
I do laundry every other week, but I wish I could do it more often.
i love the smell of beans.

content.text: I'm good, thanks! How about you?
Pretty good. I'm about to start painting a mural for my daughter's room.
Oh, that sounds fun! What are you painting?
A forest scene, with a rainbow and a unicorn.
That sounds beautiful! I'm sure she'll love it.
Thanks! I hope so. I'm listening to Pink while I paint, which is always a good time.
I love Pink! She's so talented. What's your favorite song by her?
Ooh, that's a tough one. I love so many of her songs. But I think I'd have to say "Just Give Me A Reason".
That's a great song! I love the message in it.
Me too. It's a really powerful song.
Have you ever been to a Pink concert?
Yes, I have! I saw her in concert a few years ago, and it was amazing. She's an incredible performer.
I'm so jealous! I've always wanted to see her in concert.
You should definitely go if you ever get the chance. It's a really unforgettable experience.
I will! Thanks for the tip.
